common.name: name
common.directory_not_existing: Directory does not exist or the path is invalid.
common.invalid_folder_name: Field contains invalid characters or reserved keywords.

notifications.directory_not_existing: {{dir}} directory does not exist or the path is invalid. Check the path and try again.
notifications.github_clone_auth_failed: GitHub authentication failed while cloning the repository. For more information check logs.
notifications.github_push_auth_failed: GitHub authentication failed while pushing to the repository. For more information check logs.
notifications.push_success: Your changes have been succesfully sent to the remote repository.
notifications.new_changes: There are new changes in the remote repository. Go to changes view to synchronise them.
notifications.error: Something went wrong. For more information check logs.

loaders.pushing: Pushing changes from {{dir}} to the remote repository
loaders.opening: Opening project: "{{title}}". This may take a while.

states.auth_failed: Failed to log in. Please try again.

login-screen.message: To begin, please log in using your GitHub account

technology-picker.message: Would you like to use technology extensions?
technology-picker.sass-tooltip: Sass is included by default in multilingual projects.

first-time-view.title: Choose directory
first-time-view.message: Before you start, choose the directory to which you would like to sync all your projects.

log-out-view.message: You're sure you want to log out?

updates.newVersionAvailable: New version is available. Would you like to update?

defaultDirectory.description: Directory to which you save your projects

loading.creatingGatsbyProject: Generating gatsby project based on the template...
loading.creatingConfigurationFile: Creating configuration file for the publication...

AddCollaborators.title: Would you like to add collaborators?
AddCollaborators.wrong_username_prompt: Make sure that the username is correct.
AddCollaborators.not_owner_msg: You have to be the repository owner to change the collaborators list.

PackageManager.yarn-tooltip: Initialization with yarn is not supported yet.

prompts.no_changes: No changes in this session yet.
prompts.which: Which changes should be added to a commit?

repoSync.button_sync: Update your project with new changes
repoSync.tooltip_publish: This will first update your project with any already published changes, then publish your commited changes. Are you sure they are finished?
repoSync.indicator_tooltip: Arrow turns green when your project has commits to sync/publish. If you have WIP changes, commit them to see the buttons.

loaders.sync: Updating your project with new changes...

Terminal.start_info: Use to run the project and see it in the browser. Project should automatically open in the browser. If it does not happen press the url visible in the terminal output.
Terminal.stop_info: Use to stop the process that is currently running in the terminal.
Terminal.restart_info: Use to restart the project. Handy when publication files have been moved while project was running.
Terminal.hard_reset_info: Use in cases when normal reset does not help. This will clear all build publication files and recreate it from ground up.
Terminal.clear_cache_info: Use to clear all build files manually.
Terminal.info: Run the project server to display the publication in a browser. This will allow for working on it in a hot-reload environment. Hover on the controls for more information on each action.
